html: (2 Nephi 12:6)."Soothsayers like the Philistines." As opposed to prophets who told the truth about the future, soothsayers were those who pretended to predict and fore-tell the future. Israel had turned from true prophets to false soothsayers. Mention of the Philistines may have reference to the time when the Israelite king Ahaziah sought help from Baal-zebub, the false god of the Philistine town of Ekron. (2 Kings 1.)
